about_the_game:
Haunting musical tracks from the HELMHOLTZ RESONATORS and intricate, interactive illustrations take us on a cryptical journey with five time-travelling scientists.

Here is a key attached to a note from a dead girl. Here are rare flora and avifauna. Here is a wound. Here is a mountain from which you may never return. Here is time and space, sound, light and motion.

This is a new experience in epub3. We have combined music, words and interactivity to produce an enhanced and progressive album concept.

Featuring all the music from the Helmholtz Resonators last album, Mystery Of Woolley Mountain.

Immerse yourself in the original story of The Mystery Of Woolley Mountain, an adventure you will never forget! ​
detailed_description:
Haunting musical tracks from the HELMHOLTZ RESONATORS and intricate, interactive illustrations take us on a cryptical journey with five time-travelling scientists.

Here is a key attached to a note from a dead girl. Here are rare flora and avifauna. Here is a wound. Here is a mountain from which you may never return. Here is time and space, sound, light and motion.

This is a new experience in epub3. We have combined music, words and interactivity to produce an enhanced and progressive album concept.

Featuring all the music from the Helmholtz Resonators last album, Mystery Of Woolley Mountain.

Immerse yourself in the original story of The Mystery Of Woolley Mountain, an adventure you will never forget! ​
